scripts.resources:build: node dist/createResources/fr_FR_gender.js && node dist/createResources/fr_FR_verbs.js && node dist/createResources/de_DE_gender.js && node dist/createResources/de_DE_adj.js && node dist/createResources/lefffDb.js && node dist/createResources/germanDb.js
scripts.resources: npm run resources:build && npm run resources:licence
scripts.grammars: pegjs -o dist/french-grammar.js grammars/french-grammar.pegjs && pegjs -o dist/german-grammar.js grammars/german-grammar.pegjs
scripts.build: tsc && npm run resources && npm run grammars
scripts.doc: mkdir doc_output && cp doc/freenlg-logo.png doc_output && npm run doc:html && npm run doc:pdf
